message.body: Lunch today? You might have to pick me up.
Give me a moment, I was at the hospital for a doctors appointment with Natalie. Just getting out now. I kind of have to see how things look at work first.
Actually, I just realized that I won't have a car today because it is at the train station.
I was kind of hoping to use the excuse to escape from my coworker and return a phone call to an employer I applied to last night. But that's another issue.
I am actually curious to see your new place. I've got the car tonight if I want, any objections to me driving up?
What time would you be heading up?
Not sure. We've been leaving the client on average around 6:30. Have to go back to hotel to drop off co worker. Maybe 7?

That might be an issue for tonight. Natalie's neurologist just called and wants to see her first thing in the morning. That means going to bed early and waking up at 4:30 tomorrow. Would you be able to come up tomorrow evening?
If you leave from here at 7 you will get to our place at almost 8pm
I'll be headin to the airport tomorrow night. Perhaps lunch tomorrow?
Lunch sounds good. I will pick you up. Just let me know what time.
What kind of food are you in the mood for?
